channel.title: Connection lost please wait-attempting to reestablish!EVERY FREAKING 10 SEC!
channel.description:
what the hey is wrong?i really wanna play frugoo scape and dark scape and my own server(once i make it) but it just get to the connection lost screen every ten secs!sometimes it starts,loads and bang!connection lost! help me ,please! sorry if im missing the obvious.im not very bright at computers. and sorry for any mistakes.im not english. :o
ps. hi!my first post! :)

welcome, Well its probubly their internet connection.
Or its yours,
restart ur internet (like browsers , web pages)
or try deleting cookies from ur internet cache.
if it doesnt work.
Pm frugoo and ask him
